channel.title: 317 put all my inventory + stuff i wear in bank
channel.description: I just made a zombie minigame and i want to know how to put every item players have in their inventory to the bank and all the stuff they wear to the bank when they enter in the game? (with a 317 server)

item.title: 317 put all my inventory + stuff i wear in bank
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:2, topic:399595”]This is my bank all code, you can probably mess around with it a bit to turn it into what you need.:

for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) { for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) { c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000); } }[/quote]

i tryed it but my compiler dont find c.getItems(), anyone know how can i fix it plz?

Read full topic
item.source: 317 put all my inventory + stuff i wear in bank
